scripts.concat: cat src/copyright.js src/Map.ContextMenu.js src/Mixin.ContextMenu.js src/end.js > dist/leaflet.contextmenu.js
scripts.compress: uglifyjs dist/leaflet.contextmenu.js -m --comments -o dist/leaflet.contextmenu.min.js; uglifycss dist/leaflet.contextmenu.css > dist/leaflet.contextmenu.min.css
scripts.build: npm run concat && npm run compress
